nodes.text: "The First Order" is the twenty-fifth booklet in a series of canon reference booklets of the Star Wars Encyclopedia. It was published on April 20th, 2021.

Born from the survivors of the Galactic Empire who escaped to the Unknown Regions at the end of the Galactic Civil War, the First Order appeared by surprise a few decades later to re-impose a yoke of tyranny and terror on the galaxy. Although their leader was a mysterious humanoid named Snoke, it was actually Palpatine himself who was behind his creation. Equipped with the most sophisticated weapons technology and the most fiercely loyal soldiers, the First Order was ready to rule the galaxy and had no apparent rival.
"The First Order" features a detailed map of the galaxy directly copied from the Star Wars Legends The Essential Atlas, which was authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released in 2009.
